name: ashtech/landing-testimonials
title: Landing Testimonials
description: Landing testimonials slider with 3 editable testimonials

test1Text.default: We were drawn to the open greens and the club facilities. Ashtech's attention to detail and commitment to quality gave us the confidence to invest here.

test2Text.default: As an NRI, I needed a developer I could trust. Ashtech's legacy in infrastructure and their transparent processes made this decision easy.

test3Text.default: The zero ground-level traffic and private lift lobbies sealed the deal for us. It's a level of planning you rarely see in NCR projects.
